page.title: 03PRIMARY EDUCATION
page.content: A{Playgroup}for the 3 to 5 year olds is held at Sibson Village Hall on Tuesdays and Wednesdays from 9.30 to 11.30.It is run by mothers and volunteers.There are 14 children on the roll with about 10 attending each day.Most of the children attending live in Sheepy and are transported there by car with the parents sharing transport and costs.The current cost is 70p per morning. The{Sheepy Magna Church of England {School}has 61 children on the roll. It takes children rising 5 to 11 years old. Children from Sibson are bused in.Thre are three classes arranged chronologically and the headmaster himself teaches.A part time secretary doubles as a part time helper. No school meals have been served for 6 years and most children take sandwiches.
